data.text: @yarnbeez I agree— this is too much too soon.  Even if masks were kept in indoor spaces that would help. Give i another month til we are outside more …. None of these people work in healthcare and have no idea what relaxing mandates will mean
@annleahmacinnis @yarnbeez I guess that's what happens when they actually test people.
@Goldsy1977 @yarnbeez @SCMeltedSG @Summergal2 Not enough characters allowed on twitter to dive into with too much depth honestly.

@Goldsy1977 @yarnbeez @SCMeltedSG @Summergal2 Kind of backs up what I said and does not actually contradict any of my points. Supply manipulation plays a role. The producers are incentivized to reduce supply to get more profit. So does the behaviour of investors on the NYMEX.
@PatrickFee12 Maybe ask someone from the vulnerable community how they feel about being told to calm down by someone who CLEARLY doesn't have to worry about anyone but themselves!!

@DSlayer520 @NKellegrew @OG97921596 @yarnbeez What I don’t understand is why didn’t we build an Atlantic factory to produce this stuff for a few years so we weren’t limited to testing old people and non-teacher people
@yarnbeez Yes there is a ton of COVID out there with about 40 in the hospital so relax. We are heavily vaccinated and omicron is not Delta or alpha. People need to calm down.
@TinaGrant79 @yarnbeez They were never reported in NS.
@yarnbeez It has been this high all along. Rapid tests were reported
